sentences.en: A belief in God, and trust in his providence, began to encircle his heart.
sentences.cn: 皈依上帝, 信赖上天的保佑这种念头开始萦绕在他心头.

sentences.en: A motion that encircle the ground is in stealthily each brew in square force.
sentences.cn: 一场圈地运动正悄悄在各方势力中酝酿.

sentences.en: A similar system is used to contact the communications satellites that now continually encircle the earth.
sentences.cn: 人们正把同样的系统用来与目前绕地球飞行的通讯卫星保持联系.

sentences.en: And it takes quite a few people to encircle its massive trunk . "
sentences.cn: 说着他伸出两臂,做个 搂抱 的姿式.

sentences.en: During the night - morning the coalition units continued to encircle the city from west and east.
sentences.cn: 夜间联军继续从东、西两个方向包围城市(巴格达).

sentences.en: Encircle 30 pigs in, head head rolls melon smooth circleanother's position is strong, very congenial.
sentences.cn: 圈里的30头猪, 头头滚瓜溜圆,膘肥体壮, 十分讨人喜欢.

sentences.en: It takes ten people to encircle the big tree.
sentences.cn: 形式主语不定式做主语后置这株大树要10人才能环抱.

sentences.en: It would take more than seven people to encircle the tree with outstretched arms.
sentences.cn: 树高19米,树干下围10米,中围6米,俗语称它“七楼八扎半,疙里疙瘩不上算”.

sentences.en: Let poverty start to take off, happiness and healthy encircle the world.
sentences.cn: 让世界找不到黑暗, 幸福像花开放.

sentences.en: Many bulls surround me; strong bulls of Bashan encircle me.
sentences.cn: 12有许多公牛围绕我.巴 珊 大力的公牛四面困住我.

sentences.en: Peiping first but rather to encircle Tientsin, Tangku , Lutai and Tangshan first.
sentences.cn: 四 、 我们的真正目的不是首先包围北平,而是首先包围天津 、 沽、台、山诸点.

sentences.en: The goal of sokusen sohketsu was to encircle the enemy and then destroy him.
sentences.cn: 速战速决的目标是包围敌人,然后摧毁敌人.

sentences.en: The island was encircled by a dusty road.
sentences.cn: 那座岛屿为一条尘土飞扬的公路所环绕。

sentences.en: This is avoidable by arranging the barriers to encircle the noise source.
sentences.cn: 要避免上述情况出现,可安排以屏障围绕噪音源头.

sentences.en: Trunk tall, straight, vigorous strong, two adults in order to encircle over.
sentences.cn: 树干高大挺直, 苍劲有力, 两个大人才能合抱过来.

sentences.en: We should encircle the enemy forces completely and let none escape from the net.
sentences.cn: 我们应该四面包围敌人不使一人漏网.

trans.tran_en: to surround someone or something completely
